rules_text:
Flying
When Kana Anaberal enters, target opponent gains control of it.
[i]Vanishing Dream[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, exile the top five cards of your library.
flavor_text:
[i]“Woah, a poltergeist! Whoever made this one definitely wasn't right in the head, but... she doesn't seem so bad! I think she just wants attention!”
—Ellen Fuwafuwaatama Aureus[/i]
